EmailTemplate.description: Order Acknowledgement to be used for Auto Order Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.name: Order Acknowledgement Initial
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Acknowledgement {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}, Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. We have received and processed your order and are attaching the order acknowledgement for your review.
Please review the document carefully for any additional information provided for your reference including dates and any item specific notes.
Please visit our portal to follow your order www.MyAerospace.com.
Here is your unique tracking (case) number {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can use this number to track our progress.
Your PO#: {!Case.Purchase_Order_Number__c} Honeywell Sales Order #: {!Case.Sales_Order_Number__c}
We will connect your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, if you have questions or need to reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed directly to this case.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
